channel.title: The Lord of the P.I.G.S.
channel.description: Fast-paced simulation game for 4 players, where you decide the economic fate of the Republic of Meridia.

item.title: The Lord of the P.I.G.S. Kickstarter Launches Nov. 26, 11 a.m. (CET)
item.description:
Big announcement!

After months of work and weeks of craziness, the moment has come. Tomorrow 11 a.m. we launch the Kickstarter crowdfunding campaign for The Lord Of The P.I.G.S.

item.title: First Post!
item.description:
